tokenFallback(address,uint256,bytes).details: Function that is called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds.

params._data: Data containig a function signature and/or parameters

devdoc.title: ContractReceiver - Standard contract implementation for compatibility with ERC 223 tokens.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns number of allowed tokens for given address.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets approved amount of tokens for spender. Returns success.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns number of tokens owned by given address.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfers sender's tokens to a given address, added due to backwards compatibility reasons with ERC20

transfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Function that is called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds.

params._data: Data to be sent to tokenFallback

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allows allowed third party to transfer tokens from one address to another. Returns success.

params._from: Address from where tokens are withdrawn.
params._to: Address to where tokens are sent.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets approved amount of tokens for spender. Returns success.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns number of tokens owned by given address.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allows allowed third party to transfer tokens from one address to another. Returns success.

params._to: Address to where tokens are sent.

close(address,uint32,uint192,bytes).details: Function called when any of the parties wants to close the channel and settle; receiver needs a balance proof to immediately settle, sender triggers a challenge period.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

close(address,uint32,uint192,bytes,bytes.details: Function called by the sender, when he has a closing signature from the receiver; channel is closed immediately.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._balance_msg_sig: The balance message signed by the sender.
params._closing_sig: The hash of the signed balance message, signed by the receiver.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

createChannelERC20(address,uint192).details: Creates a new channel between a sender and a receiver and transfers the sender's token deposit to this contract, compatibility with ERC20 tokens.

params._deposit: The amount of tokens that the sender escrows.

getBalanceMessage(address,uint32,uint192.details: Returns a hash of the balance message needed to be signed by the sender.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

getChannelInfo(address,address,uint32).details: Function for getting information about a channel.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

getKey(address,address,uint32).details: Returns the unique channel identifier used in the contract.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

settle(address,uint32).details: Function called by the sender after the challenge period has ended, in case the receiver has not closed the channel.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

tokenFallback(address,uint256,bytes).details: Calls createChannel, compatibility with ERC 223; msg.sender is Token contract.

params._deposit: The amount of tokens that the sender escrows.
params._sender: The address that sends the tokens.

params._added_deposit: The added token deposit with which the current deposit is increased.
params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.

verifyBalanceProof(address,uint32,uint19.details: Returns the sender address extracted from the balance proof.

params._balance: The amount of tokens owed by the sender to the receiver.

params._open_block_number: The block number at which a channel between the sender and receiver was created.
